pages.title: Red King Crab
pages.text: The red king crab ($(o)Paralithodes camtschaticus$()), also called Kamchatka crab or Alaskan king crab, is a species of king crab native to the Bering Sea and Gulf of Alaska.$(br2)It was introduced to the Barents Sea.$(br2)It grows to a leg span of 1.8 m ($(o)5.9 ft$()), and is heavily targeted by fisheries.

pages.title: Red King Crab
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:cod$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: None Days
